mapper.select:
select (select tb_template_category.title from tb_template_category where tb_template_category.id = tb_template_statistics.category_id) as categoryName, sum(tb_template_statistics.visitor_count) visitorCount, sum(tb_template_statistics.used_count) usedCount from tb_template_statistics where 1=1
AND tb_template_statistics.gmt_create >= str_to_date(#{sTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND tb_template_statistics.gmt_create <= str_to_date(#{eTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
group by category_id order by category_id

select t.id, t.name, tc.title, tmp_ts.visitorCount, tmp_ts.shareCount, tmp_ts.usedCount from tb_template as t inner join tb_template_category as tc on t.category_id = tc.id inner join (select ts.template_id, sum(ts.visitor_count) as visitorCount, sum(ts.share_count) as shareCount, sum(ts.used_count) as usedCount from tb_template_statistics as ts where 1 = 1
AND ts.gmt_create >= str_to_date(#{sTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND ts.gmt_create <= str_to_date(#{eTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
group by ts.template_id) as tmp_ts on t.id = tmp_ts.template_id
where 1=1
and t.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and tc.id = #{categoryId}

select t.id, t.name, cb.name as cbName, tmp_ts.visitorCount, tmp_ts.usedCount from tb_template as t inner join tb_company_brand as cb on t.brand_id = cb.id inner join (select ts.template_id, sum(ts.visitor_count) as visitorCount, sum(ts.share_count) as shareCount, sum(ts.used_count) as usedCount from tb_template_statistics as ts where 1 = 1
AND ts.gmt_create >= str_to_date(#{sTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND ts.gmt_create <= str_to_date(#{eTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
group by ts.template_id) as tmp_ts on t.id = tmp_ts.template_id
where 1=1
and t.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and cb.id = #{brandId}
